column1: S0224.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0224.DECK.  224. SURVEY NUMBER
S0224.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0224.Q1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEA? COUNT FROM THE TIME YOU LEFT THE STATES.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO A YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 1 1/2 YEARS 4. OVER 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 2 1/2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 1/2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q2. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT OR UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WA?  1. NO, I HAVE NOT BEEN IN COMBAT NOR UNDER ANY KIND OF ENEMY FIRE FROM THE GROUND OR AIR 2. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT, BUT I HAVE BEEN UNDER SOME KIND OF ENEMY FIRE (GROUND OR AIR) 3. I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT WITH THE ENEMY 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL, BUT DIDN'T FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q4A. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. LESS THAN 8 DAYS 2. 8 DAYS TO 14 DAYS 3. 15 DAYS TO 21 DAYS 4. 22 DAYS TO 28 DAYS 5. 29 DAYS TO 35 DAYS 6. 36 DAYS OR MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q4B. ABOUT HOW MUCH TIME IN ALL HAVE YOU SPENT IN ARMY HOSPITALS IN THE EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATION?  1. LESS THAN 15 DAYS 2. 15 DAYS TO 28 DAYS 3. 29 DAYS TO 42 DAYS 4. 43 DAYS TO 56 DAYS 5. 57 DAYS TO 70 DAYS 6. 71 DAYS OR MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q4C. DID YOU COME TO THIS HOSPITAL AFTER BEING HELD AS A PRISONER OF WAR BY THE GERMAN? (IF YES, HOW LONG WERE YOU IN GERMAN PRISON CAMP?)  1. NO 2. YES, LESS THAN 1 MONTH 3. YES, 1-3 MONTHS 4. YES, 3-6 MONTHS 5. YES, 6 MONTHS - 1 YEAR 6. YES, OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q5A. ARE YOU IN THE HOSPITAL BECAUSE OF AN INJURY OR WOUND YOU RECEIVED IN COMBA?  1. YES, BECAUSE OF AN INJURY OR WOUND RECEIVED IN COMBAT 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q5B. EXACTLY WHAT KIND OF SICKNESS OR INJURY DO YOU HAV?  1. HEAD, FACE, OR NECK 2. HANDS, ARMS, FEET OR LEGS 3. CHEST 4. BACK OR SPINE 5. OTHER PARTS OF THE BODY 6. UNCLASSIFIED AND COMBINED 7. SICKNESS (ALL TYPES) 8. UNCLASSIFIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q6A. WRITING MATERIAL?  1. HAVE ENOUGH 2. DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q6B. MAGAZINES AND NEWSPAPER?  1. HAVE ENOUGH 2. DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q6C. BOOK?  1. HAVE ENOUGH 2. DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q6D. ATHLETIC EQUIPMEN?  1. HAVE ENOUGH 2. DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q6E. MOVIE?  1. HAVE ENOUGH 2. DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q6F. PX SUPPLIE?  1. HAVE ENOUGH 2. DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q7A. HOW WOULD YOU RATE THE MEDICAL ATTENTION YOU HAVE RECEIVED SINCE BEING IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 7B NOT CODED.
S0224.Q8. ARE THERE ANY KINDS OF INFORMATION THAT YOU THINK PATIENTS COMING INTO THE HOSPITAL SHOULD BE GIVEN MORE O?  1. NO 2. YES, BUT NOTHING SPECIFIED 3. YES, AND SOMETHING SPECIFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q9. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF PAPER WORK ("RED TAPE") THERE HAS BEEN IN YOUR PROCESSING AS A PATIEN?  1. FEEL THAT THERE WAS NO MORE PAPER WORK THAN WAS NECESSARY - WITH COMMENT 2. FEEL THAT THERE WAS NO MORE PAPER WORK THAN WAS NECESSARY - WITH NO COMMENT 3. FEEL THERE WAS TOO MUCH UNNECESSARY PAPER WORK - WITH COMMENT 4. FEEL THERE WAS TOO MUCH UNNECESSARY PAPER WORK WITH NO COMMENT 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q10A. THE ARMY DOCTORS IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q10B. THE ARMY NURSES IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0224.Q10C. THE ENLISTED MEN WHO WORK IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A AND 11B NOT CODED.

S0224.Q12A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF MILITARY DRILL YOU GET AT THIS HOSPITA?  1. DO NOT GET ANY MILITARY DRILL 2. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 5. A LITTLE TOO MUCH 6. A GREAT DEAL TOO MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q12B. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE NUMBER OF MILITARY FORMATIONS YOU HAV?  1. DO NOT HAVE ANY FORMATIONS 2. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. ABOUT THE RIGHT NUMBER 5. A LITTLE TOO MANY 6. A GREAT DEAL TOO MUCH 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0224.Q12C. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF EXERCISES AND CALISTHENICS YOU HAV?  1. DO NOT HAVE ANY 2. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 5. A LITTLE TOO MUCH 6. A GREAT DEAL TOO MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q12D. HOW ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF ATHLETICS YOU HAV?  1. DO NOT HAVE ANY 2. NOT NEARLY ENOUGH 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 5. A LITTLE TOO MUCH 6. A GREAT DEAL TOO MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q13A. FROM YOUR EXPERIENCE IN THE ETO, HOW OFTEN DO YOU THINK IT HAPPENS THAT MEN ARE RETURNED TO DUTY TOO SOON AFTER BEING IN ARMY HOSPITAL?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. FAIRLY OFTEN 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. PRACTICALLY NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q13B. HOW OFTEN DO YOU THINK IT HAPPENS THAT MEN ARE KEPT IN ARMY HOSPITALS IN THE ETO TOO LONG AFTER THEY ARE WELL ENOUGH TO BE RELEASED FROM THE HOSPITA?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. FAIRLY OFTEN 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. PRACTICALLY NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0224.Q14A. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE FOOD AT THIS HOSPITA?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q14B. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE RECREATIONAL FACILITIES AT THIS HOSPITA?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES 2. COULD BE IMPROVED BUT IT WOULDN'T MAKE TOO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. COULD BE IMPROVED AND IT WOULD HELP A LOT IF IT WERE 4. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q15. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE MAIL SERVICE YOU HAVE BEEN GETTING IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY WELL SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q16. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF FREE TIME YOU ARE GIVEN TO DO WHAT YOU WANT T?  1. HAVE TOO MUCH FREE TIME WITH NOTHING TO DO 2. HAVE ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF FREE TIME 3. DO NOT HAVE QUITE ENOUGH FREE TIME 4. DO NOT HAVE NEARLY ENOUGH FREE TIME 0. NO ANSWER P. IF YOU ARE NOW WELL ENOUGH TO GO ON PASS FROM THE HOSPITAL, PLEASE ANSWER THE QUESTIONS 17A AND 17B. IF NOT, SKIP TO QUESTION 18.

S0224.Q17A. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH THE NUMBER OF PASSES YOU ARE ALLOWED FROM THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY WELL SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 5. ENTIRE Q.17 NOT ANSWERED 0. NO ANSWER TO Q.17A, BUT ANSWERS Q.17B

S0224.Q17B. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH THE WAY IN WHICH PASSES ARE HANDLED IN THIS HOSPITA?  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY WELL SATISFIED 3. NOT VERY WELL SATISFIED 4. NOT SATISFIED AT ALL 5. ENTIRE Q.17 NOT ANSWERED 0. NO ANSWER TO Q.17B, BUT ANSWERS Q.17A

S0224.Q18A. AT THE PRESENT, ARE YOU YOURSELF GIVEN MILITARY INSPECTIONS IN THIS HOSPITA? (DO NOT INCLUDE VISITS OF DOCTORS AND NURSES TO CHECK ON YOUR PHYSICAL CONDITION.)  1. NO 2. YES, UNSPECIFIED 3. YES, MORE THAN 1 PER WEEK 4. YES, LESS THAN 1 PER WEEK 5. YES, 1 PER WEEK 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q18B. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE NUMBER OF MILITARY INSPECTIONS YOU HAVE HER?  1. DO NOT HAVE ANY AT ALL 2. HAVE TOO FEW 3. HAVE ABOUT THE RIGHT NUMBER 4. HAVE TOO MANY 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q19A. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, HOW OFTEN ARE MILITARY INSPECTIONS GIVEN TO THE PEOPLE WHO WORK ON THE HOSPITAL STAFF HERE (THE DOCTORS, NURSES, WARD BOYS, ETC.)*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. FAIRLY OFTEN 3. JUST ONCE IN A WHILE 4. PRACTICALLY NEVER 5. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q19B. DO YOU THINK THESE INSPECTIONS THAT ARE GIVEN TO THE HOSPITAL STAFF MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE IN THE ATTENTION OR TREATMENT THE PATIENTS GE?  1. I THINK PATIENTS GET BETTER ATTENTION OR TREATMENT BECAUSE OF THESE INSPECTIONS 2. I THINK PATIENTS GET POORER ATTENTION OR TREATMENT BECAUSE OF THESE INSPECTIONS 3. I THINK THESE INSPECTIONS HAVE NO EFFECT ON THE ATTENTION OR TREATMENT THE PATIENTS GET 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 20 NOT CODED.

S0224.Q21A. DO YOU THINK THAT THIS HOSPITAL PAYS TOO MUCH ATTENTION, TOO LITTLE OR ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF ATTENTION TO MILITARY COURTES?  1. TOO LITTLE ATTENTION 2. TOO MUCH ATTENTION 3. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q21B. DO YOU THINK THIS HOSPITAL PAYS TOO MUCH ATTENTION, TOO LITTLE OR ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF ATTENTION TO INSPECTIONS AND "SPIT AND POLISH"*  1. TOO LITTLE ATTENTION 2. TOO MUCH ATTENTION 3. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q22. ARE THERE ANY HOSPITAL RULES OR RESTRICTIONS HERE THAT YOU FEEL SHOULD BE CHANGE?  1. NO 2. YES, WITH COMMENT 3. YES, WITH NO COMMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q23. HOW MANY POINTS DO YOU HAVE UNDER THE ARMY POINT SCORE PLA?  1. UNDER 25 POINTS 2. 25 POINTS TO 44 POINTS 3. 45 POINTS TO 64 POINTS 4. 65 POINTS TO 84 POINTS 5. 85 POINTS TO 104 POINTS 6. 105 POINTS AND OVER 7. I DO NOT KNOW, I HAVE NOT FIGURED IT 0. NO ANSWER
S0224.Q24. DO YOU EXPECT TO BE SENT BACK TO THE UNITED STATES WITHIN THE NEXT THREE MONTHS OR S?  1. YES, I THINK I PROBABLY WILL BE 2. NO, I DON'T THINK SO 3. HAVE NO IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S0224.Q25. THINK OF YOUR EXPERIENCES WITH ARMY MEDICAL SERVICE OVERSEAS. SUPPOSE YOU HAD TO DECIDE WHAT SHOULD BE DONE TO MAKE THINGS EVEN BETTER THAN THEY NOW ARE FOR THE MEN RECEIVING MEDICAL CARE. WHAT ARE THE TWO MOST IMPORTANT THINGS YOU WOULD D?  1. MADE A COMMENT 2. MADE NO COMMENT
S0224.V26. TYPE OF PATIENT:  1. REHABILITATION PATIENTS 2. AMBULATORY PATIENTS 3. BED PATIENTS 4. NON-REHABILITATION, BUT UNKNOWN WHETHER AMBULATORY OR BED PATIENTS 5. UNCLASSIFIED
S0224.V27. HOSPITAL NUMBER:  1. 108TH GENERAL 2. 221ST GENERAL 3. 2ND GENERAL 4. 203RD GENERAL 5. 1ST GENERAL 6. 68TH GENERAL 7. 76TH GENERAL 8. 15TH GENERAL 9. 65TH GENERAL 0. UNKNOWN
S0224.V28. INDIVIDUAL IDENTIFICATION NUMBER. X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP 0000.NO CODE OR NO DATA
